titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a bilateral free trade agreement with the Republic of South Africa.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/1/2014--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a bilateral free trade agreement with the Republic of South Africa.
